overview: From 2025-08-21 to 2025-08-22, ethereum-optimism/optimism had 2 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 10 active contributors.

topPRs.title: feat(kurtosis-devnet): 1/2 add flashblocks support
topPRs.author: serpixel
topPRs.body:
<!--
Contributions welcome! See https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

**Description**

Full flashblocks implementation for kurtosis, tested with `just flash-devnet && DEVNET_ENV_URL="kt://flash-devnet" DEVSTACK_ORCHESTRATOR=sysext go test -timeout 600s github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/op-acceptance-tests/tests/flashblocks`.

topPRs.title: op-up: add ASCII art on startup
topPRs.author: rickck11
topPRs.body:
Addresses [#17134](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/issues/17134)

Added a friendly ASCII art welcome banner that displays when op-up starts up, before any logs are shown.

Now the art is as same as the #17134,
But here are a few style options for the banner - happy to adjust based on feedback:

**Option 1 (Current implementation):**
```go
func showWelcomeBanner() {
	fmt.Println("###################################")
	fmt.Println("             Welcome to")
	fmt.Println("   ___  _ __        _   _ _ __  ")
	fmt.Println("  / _ \\| '_ \\ _____| | | | '_ \\ ")
	fmt.Println(" | (_) | |_) |_____| |_| | |_) |")
	fmt.Println("  \\___/| .__/       \\__,_| .__/ ")
	fmt.Println("       |_|               |_|   ")
	fmt.Println("")
	fmt.Println("    Your local OP Stack chain")
	fmt.Println("")
	fmt.Println("###################################")
	fmt.Println("")
}
```

**Option 2 (3D style):**
```go

	fmt.Println(" â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„â–„")

	fmt.Println("â–ˆ â–ˆâ–ˆ    â–ˆâ–ˆ â–ˆâ–ˆ   â–ˆâ–ˆ       â–ˆâ–ˆ    â–ˆâ–ˆ â–ˆâ–ˆ   â–ˆâ–ˆ  â–ˆ")
	fmt.Println("â–ˆ â–ˆâ–ˆ    â–ˆâ–ˆ â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ  â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ â–ˆâ–ˆ    â–ˆâ–ˆ â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ   â–ˆ")
	fmt.Println("â–ˆ â–ˆâ–ˆ    â–ˆâ–ˆ â–ˆâ–ˆ            â–ˆâ–ˆ    â–ˆâ–ˆ â–ˆâ–ˆ       â–ˆ")
	fmt.Println("â–ˆ  â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ  â–ˆâ–ˆ             â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ  â–ˆâ–ˆ       â–ˆ")
```

**Option 3 (Star Wars style):**
```go
func showWelcomeBanner() {
	fmt.Println("    .  *  .  *  .  *  .  *  .  *  .")
	fmt.Println("  *                               *")
	fmt.Println(".        A long time ago in a        .")
	fmt.Println("*         galaxy far, far away...    *")
	fmt.Println(".                                   .")
	fmt.Println("*   ___  _ __        _   _ _ __      *")
	fmt.Println(".  / _ \\| '_ \\ _____| | | | '_ \\     .")
	fmt.Println("* | (_) | |_) |_____| |_| | |_) |    *")
	fmt.Println(".  \\___/| .__/       \\__,_| .__/     .")
	fmt.Println("*       |_|               |_|        *")
	fmt.Println(".                                   .")

	fmt.Println(".                                   .")
	fmt.Println("  *     May the L2 be with you     *")
	fmt.Println("    .  *  .  *  .  *  .  *  .  *  .")
	fmt.Println("")
}
```

**Option 5 (Racing style):**

```go
	fmt.Println("    ğŸğŸğŸğŸğŸğŸğŸğŸğŸğŸğŸğŸğŸğŸğŸ")
	fmt.Println("    ")
	fmt.Println("           ğŸ’¨ğŸ’¨ğŸ’¨ VROOOOM! ğŸ’¨ğŸ’¨ğŸ’¨")

	fmt.Println("    â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•—")
```

topContributors.summary: serpixel: Focused on enhancing development tooling by adding flashblocks support to the Kurtosis devnet in ethereum-optimism/optimism via PR #17172, a significant feature contribution.
scharissis: Focused on infrastructure improvements, opening a refactor PR in ethereum-optimism/infra#448 for the `op-acceptor` test runner, and also provided one review.

pahor167: Focused on other work, opening one PR, "Celo-sepolia" in ethereum-optimism/superchain-registry#1099, which modified 7 files with a net addition of 276 lines, primarily in config and docs files.
rickck11: Focused on minor enhancements, opening a pull request to add ASCII art on startup in ethereum-optimism/optimism via PR #17169, which involved modifying 1 file with 19 additions.
xxDTECHxx: Focused on other work, making a single commit that modified one file with a net change of +3 lines, and provided one PR comment.
niran: Focused on other work, making a single commit that modified 3 files with a net change of -25 lines, and provided 1 PR comment.
